title: 2 Types - Sans and Script
content:
Hi Fontfolks, I'm wondering about this sans, at the top, and the script below. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174040im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2types_5571.jpg)
author: Chris Keegan

comments.content:
The script looks like it could be predigitally old.

Closest I can think of is [Freehand 521](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ludlow/mandate/familytree.html).
Thanks Jan. The sans looked rounded a bit, but I guess it may just be the image quality.

I might suggest [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20120515174040/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont") - this resource is amazingly accurate.
